1: pa'i//lho <error-prone>las</error-prone> dbu ma 'gyur bar bya//me mtshams 'dab mar gnas pa nyid//sgra yig <error-prone>i</error-prone> dang ldan pa <error-prone>yi//byang</error-prone> las dang po 'gyur bar bya//dbus las dang po de bzhin du//thig le yang dag
2: ldan pa'o//zhes <error-prone>bcom</error-prone> ldan 'das dpal rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so//dbus las dbu ma de bzhin <error-prone>du//thig</error-prone> <error-prone>le nga</error-prone> ro yang dag ldan//dbus las <error-prone>tha ma</error-prone> bzung ba <error-prone>dang //yi</error-prone> ge a dang <error-prone>ldan</error-prone> pa
3: <error-prone>yi//rlung</error-prone> mtshams phyi rol gnas par 'gyur//me mtshams 'dab mar gnas pa nyid//byang las dang po yang yin te//dbus las dbu ma pa yang <error-prone>bzung //e</error-prone> yig me mtshams dang ldan pa'i//
4: lho nas dbu ma 'gyur bar bya//rlung mtshams phyi rol pa bzung <error-prone>nas//tsheg</error-prone> drag <error-prone>o</error-prone> yig sbyor bas so//zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal bde ba <error-prone>chen</error-prone> po rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so//o yig
5: thig le dang ldan pa'i//dbus las dbu ma yang yin te//me mtshams 'dab <error-prone>ma can</error-prone> ldan pa'i//dbus las dbu ma 'gyur ba'o//o yig dang ni ldan pa yi//bden bral 'dab mar gnas
6: de <error-prone>bzhin//lho las</error-prone> dang po de bzhin du//yi ge <error-prone>i</error-prone> <error-prone>yig ldan</error-prone> pa yi//byang las tha ma yang <error-prone>yin te//dbang</error-prone> ldan 'dab mar gnas pa la//zla tshes thig le gtsug gi zhal//zhes bcom ldan
7: <error-prone>'das</error-prone> dpal thogs pa med pa'i shin tu dga' ba'i rdo rje sems dpas gsungs <error-prone>so//me</error-prone> mtshams 'dab mar gnas pa la//zla tshes thig le gtsug gi zhal//dbus las tha <error-prone>ma</error-prone> yang de <error-prone>bzhin//</error-prone>
8: sgra yig a dang <error-prone>sbyor</error-prone> ba <error-prone>yi//rlung</error-prone> mtshams phyi rol par 'gyur te//dbang ldan phyi rol gnas nyid la//me mtshams stan dang ldan <error-prone>pa</error-prone> <error-prone>ste//sgra</error-prone> yig o dang sbyor bar bya//bzhi <error-prone>par</error-prone> yongs su grags pa
